text: Can you help me modify my reservation for Product Development Meeting on March 29, 2023 at 10:00 AM in the Research and Development Department with attendees Robert Lee, Anna Zhang, and Tony Wang?
Sure. Let me search for the relevant tool first.

output.name: GetUserToken
output.desc_for_search: get user tokenGet the user token.

output.name: ModifyMeeting
output.description: This API allows users to modify a reservation for a meetingFunction：Delete user's reservation for a meeting.Exception Handling：1. If the modification is successful, return a success message.2. If the modification fails, return a corresponding error message.

meeting_topic.description: The title of the meeting, no more than 50 characters.

start_time.description: The start time of the meeting, in the pattern of %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S

end_time.description: The end time of the meeting, in the pattern of %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S

location.description: The location where the meeting to be held, no more than 100 characters.

attendees.description: The attendees of the meeting, including names, positions and other information.

text: To modify your reservation, I need your authentication token. Please provide me with your username and password.
My username is user4 and my password is user4pass.
Thank you. Now, let me get your token.
I have received your token. Let me modify your reservation.
Your reservation has been modified successfully.
